description: Try our easy to follow Brie & Sprouts Focaccia recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Focaccia,Brussels sprout,Seafood free,Soy free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Peanut free
name: Brie & Sprouts Focaccia Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place sugar, reserving 1 tsp, into a small non-stick frying pan over medium-low heat. Dissolve sugar, tilting pan to melt evenly. When golden, add 1/4 cup water and garlic and cook for 6 minutes or until soft and a rich golden colour. Mix in 1 tbs water and pour onto a baking paper-lined plate. Set aside.
Whisk 1/4 cup warm water, yeast and reserved sugar in a jug. Set aside in a warm place for 10 minutes or until it becomes frothy.
Place sprouts in a bowl, cover with boiling water and stand for 5 minutes to soften. Drain, cool and halve.
Place flour in a large bowl, add yeast mixture and 2 tbs oil. Gradually add 11/4 cups water, stirring with a fork until a sticky dough forms. Stand for 10 minutes to rest.
Preheat oven to 230Â°C. Grease a large baking tray. Halve dough and press out one portion on tray to form a 35x23cm rectangle. Spread with 1/2 cup chutney. Top with brie and garlic.
On a floured surface, press out remaining dough as before. Lay over filling and brush with remaining chutney. Using your fingertips, form dimples over surface. Stand for 30 minutes or until it rises.
Press sprouts and rosemary into surface, drizzle with remaining oil and sprinkle with sea salt flakes. Bake for 25 minutes or until golden and crisp. Serve.
